page.title: 09The Life Of Mr. Richards
page.content: Mr. Richards was born in 1912. He was born in Pembridge, Herefordshire, and he has no brothers or sisters. Mr. Richards went to Pembridge School and then he went to Scudamore School in Hereford. Scudamore School was in two parts when Mr. Richards attended there. After finishing the school at 14 you had to pay two guineas to finish off your education. Mr. Richards could not afford to go back to school, so he went to work on a farm straight from school. He was paid ten shillings a week (50p). Mr. Richards has had only the one job (farming). He married when he was 24 and says it was a very romantic courtship. He met his wife in Callow where village parties and dances were held. He has been married for 49 years and
